summary:
Natural leader, empathetic and compassionate with the ability to influence people at all levels both internally and externally. Highly analytical, results driven and a creative problem solver who can make decisive decisions. Strong communication and organisational skills and always a good team player.
Achievements
•	Within 8 Months in Unilever received a promotion to field operations manager and 13 months later to National account manager
•	Nominated to attend the Global future leaders Congress in 2008
•	Career highlight include multiple awards for performance, as well as being nominated and going on to win the People Choice award. 2010.
•	Led the implementation of the Ola Ice cream roll out into bottom end trade through wholesalers within my portfolio? Worked cross-functionally with Trade Marketing, Category Development, Marketing and the account teams in partnership with Wholesalers to develop and role out the plans that resulted in increased distribution and market share gain.
•	Through Joint Business Planning with customers developed key customer specific promotion activities.
•	Overcoming a system constraint. Developed a way for a customer whose sales system could not managed banded and multipack offers to do so using banding and obsolete barcodes at a store level.
•	At the same time as being a fulltime employee at a school as a teacher’s assistant I obtained a post graduate certificate in education within 2 years.
•	Continued studying and completed an honours degree in Educational leadership and management in 2019.
•	My greatest achievement has been the relationship built with a student who has special needs. This young man joined my class unable to interact with other and could not read or write, however over the years I spent with him he developed interpersonal communication skills and basic reading and math skills. He is now able and quite willing to initiate conversation with others.

profile_positions.description: My responsibilities as a National Account Manger are to act as an ambassador for Unilever to the Customer and be the voice of the Customer back into Unilever and by joint business planning and customer specific executions achieve both the volume and P&L objectives, whilst ensuring optimisation of the category strategies. I am responsible for the development of joint business plans for the various categories working in close collaboration with the category manager and customer marketers to ensure an optimal integrated promotional plan whilst managing promotional investment. Communication with the field operations team and providing clear direction is pivotal, as well as constant follow-up to ensure the delivery of objectives as per agreement. My customer interactions also include the negotiating of trading terms, trade funding and managing the overall customer investment by category whilst monitoring customer performance, contribution and market shares. Dealing with Shoprite afforded me the privilege of a forward planning structured account and having looked after Massmart/Walmart which traditionally was less structured and more complex given the decentralised model has challenged me to be quite reactive and quick to make conscious decisions, however the greatest learning from both are if you build a trusting relationship that is mutually beneficial built on sound business understanding the job is a pleasure
